Detailed Description

Functions for working with problem data.

Function implementations for working with problem data, generally manipulating the arrow_problem data structure.

Author:
John LaRusic

Definition in file problem.c.

int arrow_problem_abtsp_to_sbtsp ( int  shallow,
arrow_problem *  old_problem,
int  infinity,
arrow_problem *  new_problem 
)

Transforms an asymmetric BTSP problem of n nodes into a symmetric BTSP problem with 2n nodes.

Parameters:
shallow [in] if true only a shallow copy of data will be created
old_problem [in] the asymmetric problem
infinity [in] value to use as "infinity"
new_problem [out] the new symmetric problem
